parameters.text:
Where does it come from?
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, 
a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word 
in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by 
Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from 
a line in section 1.10.32.

parameters: Text = Where does it come from? Contrary to popular belief,…
That's it! That's my Diary, thank you.
Here, as a reward for returning it, I offer you a page of it, my father told me it held magical powers in just the paper...
Perhaps you can retrieve  some other items for me, if you would.
Please, I'm also missing my mother's dress, and my father's lance.
Th-they were both stolen, I suspect it was the one with the blue hair. He's a wretched thief!
Oh, well thank you for returning my diary.
Have you come back to help me?
Please, I'm also missing my mother's dress, and my father's lance.
Th-they were both stolen, I suspect it was the one with the blue hair. He's a wretched thief!
Oh, well thank you for returning my diary.
My mother's Dress! The one she wore on her wedding day...
What do you mean, 'why is it black'?
Nevertheless, I seemed to have also lost my father's old weapon, his trusty lance.
Could you bring it to me?
My father's Lance! Thank you! Now everything is nearly perfect...
Let me know when you've found it... I know I dropped it somewhere...
Thank you for all of your help...
Please, I'm still missing my mother's dress...
That's it! That's my Diary, thank you.
Here, as a reward for returning it, I offer you a page of it, my father told me it held magical powers in just the paper...
Perhaps you can retrieve  some other items for me, if you would.
Please, I'm also missing my mother's dress, and my father's lance.
Th-they were both stolen, I suspect it was the one with the blue hair. He's a wretched thief!
Oh, well thank you for returning my diary.
Have you come back to help me?
Please, I'm also missing my mother's dress, and my father's lance.
Th-they were both stolen, I suspect it was the one with the blue hair. He's a wretched thief!
Oh, well thank you for returning my diary.
Have you found the items yet?
Yes! You found my mother's dress.
You say it wasn't the blue haired man that stole it?
Oh, let me know when you find them...
Have you found the items yet?
Yes! You found my father's Lance!
You say it wasn't the blue haired man that stole it?
Oh, let me know when you find them...
you must go and confront my father, and take the \c[12]Forbidden Chalice!\c[0]
There's just one more item you must retrieve for me, but it is still
Please, hurry back with the Chalice!
Just one last thing left to do!
With that you can negate your foes abilities, I thank you for
